mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO userinfo (uid, uname, mobile, uintro, uavatar, age, gender, school, tag, longitude, latitude) VALUES (#{uid}, #{uname}, #{mobile}, #{uintro}, #{uavatar}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{school}, #{tag}, #{longitude}, #{latitude})
mapper.select: SELECT uid, uname, mobile, uintro, uavatar, age, gender, school, tag, longitude, latitude FROM userinfo WHERE uid = #{uid}
